practice_phrases: He needs help.
他需要帮助。
He needs to wait.
他需要等待。
He needs somewhere to live.
他需要地方住。
He needs to stay together.
他需要住在一起。
He needs to do different things.
他需要做不同的事。
He needs somewhere to live at the time.
他那时需要地方住。
He needs help because we didn't have anything.
他需要帮助，因为我们什么都没有。
He needs to do the sensible thing.
他需要做明智的事。
He needs to know what would have been sensible.
他需要知道什么会是明智的。
He needs somewhere to stay because we didn't have anywhere to live then.
他需要住的地方，因为我们那时没有地方住。

seed_context.target: He needs to look for work.

practice_phrases: Need to look for work.
需要找工作。
We need to look for work.
我们需要找工作。
I need to look for work now.
我现在需要找工作。
They need to look for work together.
他们需要一起找工作。
We need to look for work in the first place.
我们最初需要找工作。
He needs to look for work at the time.
他那时需要找工作。
We didn't have anywhere to live, so we need to look for work.
我们没有地方住，所以需要找工作。
They need to look for work because they needed help.
他们需要找工作，因为他们需要帮助。
I need to look for work, and that would have been the sensible thing.
我需要找工作，那会是明智的事。
We need to look for work because we didn't have anything at the time.
我们需要找工作，因为我们那时什么都没有。

seed_context.target: He needs to look for work.

practice_phrases: Look for work.
找工作。
I'll look for work.
我会找工作。
We can look for work together.
我们可以一起找工作。
They look for work here.
他们在这里找工作。
We would have looked for work then.
我们那时会找工作。
I'd have looked for work in the first place.
我最初会找工作。
He needs to look for work because we needed help.
他需要找工作，因为我们需要帮助。
We didn't have anywhere to live, so we look for work.
我们没有地方住，所以找工作。
I'd have looked for work if I'd known what I know now.
如果我知道我现在知道的，我会找工作。
They would have looked for work at the time, and that would have been sensible.
他们那时会找工作，那会是明智的。

seed_context.target: He needs to look for work.
